summary: Defines the top‑level Prefect command‑line interface using Typer, configuring global settings, logging, and rich console output. It registers common options, handles interactive detection, wraps command execution with unified exception handling, and provides version information for the Prefect CLI.
business_intent: Offer end‑users a unified, configurable command‑line entry point to manage Prefect workflows, view version details, and invoke sub‑commands with consistent error handling and output formatting.
